full_summary:
# Maintenance of Steris Autoclaves

### Tender Details

| Property | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Solicitation Number | 01B46-2023-007 |
| Publication Date | 2023-02-17 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-03-06 14:00:00 |
| Tender Status | Expiré (Expired) |

### Contract Summary

* Contract Type: Preventive Maintenance Service Agreement
* Duration: Five (5) years
* Objective: To provide a preventive maintenance support plan for the servicing and maintenance of five (5) Steris autoclaves located at the Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Center.

### Contract Requirements

The contracting entity, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, seeks a contractor to provide a preventive maintenance support plan for the servicing and maintenance of five (5) Steris autoclaves. The scope of work includes:

* Servicing and maintenance of the autoclaves
* Ensuring compliance with manufacturer's recommendations and industry standards
* Providing regular maintenance reports and updates to the client

### Tender Conditions

* Tenderers must demonstrate experience in providing similar maintenance services for laboratory equipment
* Tenderers must have a valid Certificate of Recognition (COR) or equivalent
* Tenderers must comply with the Trade Agreements outlined in the tender package

### Contact Information

* Jean-François Lemay
* Position: Director, Procurement Services
* Email: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
* Telephone: 343-571-9706

### Tender Documents

The tender documents are available for download from the Canada.Buyandsell.gc.ca website. Please note that the tender is no longer open for submissions.
